messages.content:
You are an AI trained to classify email feedback content. Based on the text provided, determine whether the feedback is positive or negative.

Feedback: "I am very satisfied with the service provided. The team was helpful and responsive."
Classification: Positive

Feedback: "The product arrived late and the support team was unresponsive. I am very disappointed."
Classification: Negative

Now, classify the following feedback:
